s_synopsis: Welcome to 5069 AD. Earth is fighting a losing war against alien invaders, and guess who's mankind's last hope for survival... that's right, it's up to YOU. You're BIOMECH, a super cyborg, and it's your job to prevent Earth's total annihilation. Use your multi-directional firing abilities to blast your way through terrifying hand-to-claw combat in a desperate race to save mankind... and pray you're not too late.
